org.jasig.cas.util

Class ShiroCipherExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.util.AbstractCipherExecutor<byte[],byte[]>
      • org.jasig.cas.util.ShiroCipherExecutor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CipherExecutor<byte[],byte[]>

    @Component(value="shiroCipherExecutor")
public class ShiroCipherExecutor
extends AbstractCipherExecutor<byte[],byte[]>
    A implementation that is based on algorithms provided by the default platform's JCE. By default AES encryption is used which requires both the secret key and the IV length to be of size 16.
    Since:
    4.2
